overview.en: The elephant chain is an application scenario of the tourism chain reform independently developed by Gu Da E-Commerce (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. based on blockchain technology. It adheres to the concept of keeping the righteousness, uses the blockchain technology allowed within the scope of the policy, and is determined to innovate, not ICO. , do not go to overseas exchanges, and do practical technology. The elephant chain contains elephant points + elephant wallet + elephant travel consumer chain. The elephant chain has the functions of decentralization, non-tamperable, circulation in the public chain, independent H5 wallet, landing application, top technology, strong capacity expansion, large user base, and can be widely used in tourism travel. Elephant points are based on the ERC20 standard and can be circulated in a universal wallet, such as im Token. Because of the current visible value of elephant points, the elephant chain will also exist for a long time. Guda takes the ticket B2B service as the core, expands business travel, tourism, events, and builds a big travel eco-link and a tourism consumption public chain.
overview.zh: 大象链是古大电子商务（上海）有限公司基于区块链技术自主研发的旅游链改应用场景，坚持守正出奇的理念，使用政策范围内允许的区块链技术，并立志创新，不ICO，不上海外交易所,踏踏实实做技术。大象链包含大象积分+大象钱包+大象旅游消费链。大象链具有去中心化、不可篡改、在公有链进行流通等功能特点，独立H5钱包、落地应用，顶尖技术，扩容性强，用户群庞大，可广泛应用于旅游出行领域。大象积分基于ERC20标准，可在通用钱包中流通，例如im Token。因为大象积分当前可见的价值，大象链也将长期存在。古大以机票B2B服务为核心，拓展商旅，旅游，赛事，打造大出行生态联盟以及旅游消费公有链。
